title: Calories in Medium McDonald's Coke
meta_description: Learn calories in medium McDonald's Coke (16 oz serving), including carbs, sugars, sodium, and quick diet tweaks for better choices.
assumptions: 16 fl oz (473 ml) Coca-Cola serving at McDonald's; nutrition for full beverage, ice not included in calorie count but may dilute if melted.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact formulation, and serving size; check McDonald's app or labels for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A medium McDonald's Coke contains 190 calories, primarily from 49 g of sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Opt for small size (12 oz) versus medium

faqs.q: How many calories in medium McDonald's Coke?
faqs.a: About 190 calories for a 16 oz serving.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a medium McDonald's Coke?
faqs.a: 49 g of carbohydrates, all from sugars, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does McDonald's Coke have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; it's purely carbs and sodium (45 mg).

faqs.q: How does ice affect calories in medium McDonald's Coke?
faqs.a: Ice adds no calories but may dilute the drink if it melts, slightly reducing effective calories per sip.

faqs.q: What's the difference in calories between medium and large McDonald's Coke?
faqs.a: Large (21 oz) has about 250 calories, 60 more than medium.
